Note: Participant says they’re not usually susceptible to car sickness
Participant notices that screen quality improves as they look toward different colored backgrounds. Participant is not looking at road since they say they cannot see MR display clearly
Participant’s focus is 50/50 on the road and on MR display
Participant is happy with positioning of screen in MR glasses
Participant notes that scrolling down motion is less responsive than other scrolling motions
Handedness of neural band is particularly important as participant is left handed and settings for band were geared toward right hand. Neural band was not as responsive until switch.
Participant does not notice any glare or rainbow effect in the glasses and says lenses are clear under different lighting conditions
